question:
Consider the following Bills:
  1. Money bill
  2. Financial Bill of category A
  3. Financial Bill of category B
Which of the above can be introduced only in Lok Sabha?
explanation: Financial bill of category B can be introduced in either House of the Parliament.  Money Bills are those Bills which contain only provisions dealing with all or any of the matters specified in sub-clauses (a) to (f) of clause (1) of article 110 of the Constitution. Money Bills and Financial Bills of Category A can be introduced only in the Lok Sabha.
